definitions.definition: A plant which was introduced to an area by humans (or arrived naturally , but from an area in which it was present as a human introduction ) and became naturalized before 1500 C.E. (but especially in prehistoric times ).

main_definition: ( botany ) A plant which was introduced to an area by humans (or arrived naturally , but from an area in which it was present as a human introduction ) and became naturalized before 1500 C.E. (but especially in prehistoric times ).
